about_the_game:
Distant Past thrusts you into a retro first-person shooter experience reminiscent of classics like classic boomer shooters. In a world thriving with advanced technologies 50,000 years ago, an unexpected invasion threatens to erase humanity's existence. Armed with advanced weaponry, navigate pixelated landscapes, battle relentless alien hordes, and uncover the secrets of a civilization on the brink of destruction. Can you be the hero the ancient world needs, or will the invaders prevail? The fate of the past lies in your hands.

In this immersive fusion of classic boomer shooters and platformers, your skills will be put to the test as you face dozens of diverse enemies and navigate challenging environments. The fate of the ancient world rests squarely on your shoulders. Arm yourself with an array of powerful weapons, use the terrain to your advantage, and adapt on the fly as you battle through this pixelated adventure. Your every move counts in a world where each encounter is a pulse-pounding test of skill and strategy.
